<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description>Run this script after adding the Auto Balanced Collectors Update Set.  It will disable some base code and enable the updates provided.</description><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>Auto Balanced Collectors - Setup</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[//Set Original LM - Device Provision Business Rule to Inactive
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
gr.get('57fecf12db0e6300727673278c961978');
gr.active = 'false';
gr.update();
//Set new LM - Device Provision ABCG Business Rule to Active
var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
gr2.get('a82dc8d7db833300ed7e9b81ca961916');
gr2.active = 'true';
gr2.update();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-20 21:54:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>1d498247db933300ed7e9b81ca9619ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Balanced Collectors - Setup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB" source="x_lomo_lmcmdbint">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1d498247db933300ed7e9b81ca9619ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-20 22:03:45</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_a3b0445fdb433300ed7e9b81ca961911
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>LM - Collector Groups Import</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2018-10-19 19:53:05</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>on_demand</run_type><script><![CDATA[try{
	var offset = 0;
	var batchSize = gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.device_import.batch_size');
	var returnedCount = batchSize;
	//SysID of the Get Collector REST call.
	var restSysId = gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.rest.getcollectorgroups');
	
	while(returnedCount == batchSize){
		//Build Auth Header
		var auth = new LogicMonitorUtils().authorize(restSysId);
		
		// Call the REST Message
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.LogicMonitor CMDB', 'GET - Collector Groups');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape("portal", gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.portal.name'));
		r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', auth);
		var response = r.execute();
		
		//Set Response Details
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		var targetTable = '';
		gs.debug("LM-CMDB: Collector Group Response Body: " + responseBody);
		
		//REST Success
		if(httpStatus == '200'){
			gs.info("LM-CMDB Get Collector Group REST Call success. Status: " + httpStatus);
			var obj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
			returnedCount = obj.items.length;
			gs.info("LM-CMDB Returned Collector Group Count " + returnedCount);
			//Process all Collector Records to Import Table
			for (var key in obj.items) {
				var gr = new GlideRecord('x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_collector_groups');
				gr.initialize();
				gr.lm_group_id = obj.items[key].id;
				gr.name = obj.items[key].name;
				gr.description = obj.items[key].description;
				gr.lm_autobalanced = obj.items[key].autoBalance;
				gr.insert();
			}
		}
		else{
			gs.error("LM-CMDB REST ERROR. Response Status " + httpStatus + " -- " + response.getErrorMessage());
			break;
		}
		offset += batchSize;
	}
} catch (err){
	gs.error("LM-CMDB Error in Scheduled Import: " + err);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-08 20:19:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>a3b0445fdb433300ed7e9b81ca961911</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LM - Collector Groups Import</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB" source="x_lomo_lmcmdbint">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_a3b0445fdb433300ed7e9b81ca961911</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-08 20:25:14</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_script_548544d3db833300ed7e9b81ca9619e2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="LM - Collector Groups Transform Map">15d7678bdb033300ed7e9b81ca96194a</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target) {
	//Add query so that group can identify Collector CI's that are associated to it.
	try{
		if(action == "insert"){
			if(target.sys_id != '' && target.sys_id != null){
				var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_group_contains_encoded_query');
				gr.initialize();
				gr.condition = "collector_group_id=" + source.lm_group_id + "^EQ";
				gr.setValue('class', "x_lomo_lmcmdbint_cmdb_ci_logicmonitor_collector");
				gr.group = target.sys_id;
				gr.insert();
			}
		}
	} catch (err) {
		gs.error("LM-CMDB Error Processing Collector Group, Transform Map, onAfter Rule: " + err);
	}
	
})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-08 20:43:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>548544d3db833300ed7e9b81ca9619e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB" source="x_lomo_lmcmdbint">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_548544d3db833300ed7e9b81ca9619e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-08 21:04:52</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c9d53842db2f3300ed7e9b81ca9619d1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_lomo_lmcmdbint.LogicMonitorABCGUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>LogicMonitorABCGUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var LogicMonitorABCGUtils = Class.create();
LogicMonitorABCGUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    addDevicesToImportSet: function(payload) {
        var obj = payload;
        var importErr = false;
        var importSet = 'x_lomo_lmcmdbint_imp_device_list';
        for (var key in obj.items) {
            //Create a new record on the Import Set for each device
            var gr = new GlideRecord(importSet);
            gr.initialize();
            gr.id = obj.items[key].id;
            gr.name = obj.items[key].name;
            gr.displayname = obj.items[key].displayName;
            gr.description = obj.items[key].description;
            gr.devicetype = obj.items[key].deviceType.toString();
			gr.lm_abcg_id = obj.items[key].autoBalancedCollectorGroupId.toString();
			
            //Combine all properties entries into a single entry for ease of access.
            var propSections = ['systemProperties', 'customProperties', 'autoProperties', 'inheritedProperties'];
            var allProps = [];
            for (var i in propSections) {
                for (var j in obj.items[key][propSections[i]]) {
                    allProps.push(obj.items[key][propSections[i]][j]);
                }
            }
            gr.allproperties = JSON.stringify(allProps);

            //Leave individual property entries for troubleshooting
            gr.customproperties = JSON.stringify(obj.items[key].customProperties);
            gr.systemproperties = JSON.stringify(obj.items[key].systemProperties);
            gr.autoproperties = JSON.stringify(obj.items[key].autoProperties);
            gr.inheritedproperties = JSON.stringify(obj.items[key].inheritedProperties);

            //Get sys_id and sys_class_name if it's available on the LogicMonitor Device
            var properties = JSON.parse(gr.allproperties);
            for (var k in properties) {
                if (properties[k].name == "sn.sys_id") {
                    gr.sn_sys_id = properties[k].value;
                }
                if (properties[k].name == "sn.sys_class_name") {
                    gr.sn_sys_class_name = properties[k].value;
                }
                if (properties[k].name == "sn.cloud.sys_id") {
                    gr.sn_cloud_sys_id = properties[k].value;
                }
            }

            try {
                gr.insert();
            } catch (err) {
                importErr = true;
                gs.info("LM CMDB - Error adding record to Device Import Set -- LM ID:" + obj.items[key].id);
            }
        }
        return importErr;
    },

    type: 'LogicMonitorABCGUtilss'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-29 23:30:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>c9d53842db2f3300ed7e9b81ca9619d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LogicMonitorABCGUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB" source="x_lomo_lmcmdbint">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c9d53842db2f3300ed7e9b81ca9619d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-29 23:44:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_47b23486dbeb3300ed7e9b81ca9619bc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>LM - Standard Device Import - ABCG</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2018-11-27 19:23:15</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>on_demand</run_type><script><![CDATA[try{
	gs.info("LM-CMDB Starting LogicMonitor Standard Device Import");
	
	//Set Starting Variables
	var offset = 0;
	var batchSize = gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.device_import.batch_size');
	var returnedCount = batchSize;
	
	while(returnedCount == batchSize){
		//Get epoch string for filter based on Property Setting for how long devices should be in LM before importing and include in the filter.
		var epochWait = new LogicMonitorUtils().getDeviceWait();
		//Filter for which devices to gather.
		var filter = 'deviceType:0,createdOn<:' + epochWait.toString();
		
		//Get LogicMonitor Devices with offset, batchSize, and filter
		var response = LogicMonitorAPI.getDevices(offset, batchSize, filter);
		
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		var rateRemain = response.getHeader('X-Rate-Limit-Remaining');
		var rateWindow = response.getHeader('X-Rate-Limit-Window');
		
		if(httpStatus == '200'){
			gs.debug("LM-CMDB Debug: Device Import REST Call success -- " + httpStatus + " -- Payload: "+ responseBody);
			
			var obj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
			//Update Returned Count to number of records in return batch.
			//Once this count is lower than the batch size the while loop will exit.
			returnedCount = obj.items.length;
			
			//Send payload to add devices function
			var importStatus = new LogicMonitorABCGUtils().addDevicesToImportSet(obj);
			if (importStatus){
				gs.error("LM-CMDB Standard Device Import Set Completed with Errors.  Device Filter: " + filter);
			} else {
				gs.info("LM-CMDB Standard Device Import Set Completed. Device Filter: " + filter);
			}
			
		} else {
			if(httpStatus == '429'){
				gs.error("LM-CMDB Device Import Rate Limited.  Please Contact LogicMonitor Support for help with this error." + httpStatus + " -- " + response.getErrorMessage());
				break;
			} else {
				gs.error("LM-CMDB Device Import REST ERROR " + httpStatus + " -- " + response.getErrorMessage());
				break;
			}
		}
		//Before loop happens increase offset.
		//If the next loop runs the LM API call will gather next set of records using offset.
		offset += batchSize;
	}
	gs.info("LM CMDB Ending LogicMonitor Standard Device Import");
} catch (err) {
	gs.error("LM-CMDB Error in Scheduled Job Processing: " + err);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-29 23:16:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>47b23486dbeb3300ed7e9b81ca9619bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LM - Standard Device Import - ABCG</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB" source="x_lomo_lmcmdbint">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_47b23486dbeb3300ed7e9b81ca9619bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-29 23:16:35</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a82dc8d7db833300ed7e9b81ca961916
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>cmdb_ci</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="cmdb_ci">ip_addressISNOTEMPTY^nameISNOTEMPTY^x_lomo_lmcmdbint_logicmonitor_enableCHANGESTOtrue^x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_resource_idISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="ip_address" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="x_lomo_lmcmdbint_logicmonitor_enable" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="false" field="x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_resource_id" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>LM - Device Provision ABCG</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	try{
	var sysId = current.sys_id;
	var payload = {
		"name": current.ip_address.toString(),
		"displayName": current.name.toString(),
		"disableAlerting": gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.alerting_status').toString(),
		"hostGroupIds": gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.group.default'),
		"description": current.short_description.toString(),
		"customProperties": [
		{
			"name": "sn.sys_id",
			"value": sysId.toString()
		},
		{
			"name":"sn.cmdb_url",
			"value":gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + "nav_to.do?uri=cmdb_ci.do?sys_id=" + sysId.toString()
		}
		]};
		//If Device has an Auto Balanced Collector ID Assigned when it's created it will proivison it to the ABCG Group.
	    if(current.x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_abcg_id != "0" && current.x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_abcg_id != null){
			payload.autoBalancedCollectorGroupId = current.x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_abcg_id.toString();
		}	else {
			payload.preferredCollectorId = collectorId().toString();
		}
	
	
		payload = new LogicMonitorUtils().outboundMapping(payload, current.sys_id);
		gs.debug("LM-CMDB Provision Device Payload " + JSON.stringify(payload));
		
		var response = LogicMonitorAPI.createDevice(payload);
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		
		if(httpStatus == '200'){
			gs.debug("LM-CMDB Provision Device Success Response: " + responseBody);
			var obj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
			var sysProp = obj.systemProperties;
			for (var i in sysProp){
				if(sysProp[i].name == 'system.deviceId'){
					current.x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_resource_id = sysProp[i].value;
				}
				if(sysProp[i].name == 'system.devicetype'){
					current.x_lomo_lmcmdbint_logicmonitor_devicetype = sysProp[i].value;
				}
			}
			try {
				current.setWorkflow(false);
				current.update();
				gs.info("LM-CMDB Provision Device Success -- " + httpStatus + " -- LM ID: " + sysProp[i].value);
			} catch (err){
				gs.error("LM-CMDB Updating Device After Provision had an error: " + err);
			}
		}
		else{
			gs.error("LM-CMDB REST POST Error -- " + httpStatus + " ERROR MESSAGE: " + response.getErrorMessage() + "   --   RESPONSE: " + responseBody + " -- SysID: " + sysId);
			current.x_lomo_lmcmdbint_logicmonitor_enable = false;
			current.update();
		}
	} catch (err) {
		gs.error("LM-CMDB Business Rule ABCG Error: " + err);
	}
		
		//Function to get preferred Collector ID from relationship or fallback Collector ID.
		function collectorId(){
				var rel = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
				rel.addQuery('child', current.sys_id);
				rel.addQuery('type', gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.ci_relationship.collector'));
				rel.query();
				if(rel.next()){
					return rel.parent.collector_id;
				}
				else{
					gs.error("LM-CMDB Default Collector used for POST " + current.name);
					//Might need to error check that this has a value.
					return gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.collector.default');
				}
			}
		
	})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-08 21:13:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a82dc8d7db833300ed7e9b81ca961916</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LM - Device Provision ABCG</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB" source="x_lomo_lmcmdbint">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a82dc8d7db833300ed7e9b81ca961916</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-29 23:47:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a82dc8d7db833300ed7e9b81ca961916"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_1b348053db833300ed7e9b81ca961938
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>LM - Collector Import (with Group Id)</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2018-10-19 19:53:05</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>on_demand</run_type><script><![CDATA[var offset = 0;
var batchSize = gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.device_import.batch_size');
var returnedCount = batchSize;
//SysID of the Get Collector REST call.
var restSysId = gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.rest.getcollector');

//TODO - Need to confirm if collectors actually exist in the existing list.  If not disable them.

while(returnedCount == batchSize){
	//Build Auth Header
	var auth = new LogicMonitorUtils().authorize(restSysId);

	// Call the REST Message
	var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.LogicMonitor CMDB', 'GET Collector List');
	r.setStringParameterNoEscape("portal", gs.getProperty('x_lomo_lmcmdbint.logicmonitor.portal.name'));
	r.setRequestHeader('Authorization', auth);
	r.setQueryParameter('fields','id,createdOn,status,build,isDown,hostname,description,collectorSize,arch,collectorDeviceId,collectorGroupId');
	var response = r.execute();

	//Set Response Details
	var responseBody = response.getBody();
	var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
	var targetTable = '';
	gs.debug("LM-CMDB: Collector List Response Body: " + responseBody);

	//REST Success
	if(httpStatus == '200'){
		gs.info("LM-CMDB Get Collector List REST Call success. Status: " + httpStatus);
		var obj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
		returnedCount = obj.items.length;
		gs.info("LM-CMDB Returned Collector Count " + returnedCount);
		//Process all Collector Records to Import Table
		for (var key in obj.items) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord('x_lomo_lmcmdbint_imp_collector_list');
			gr.initialize();
			gr.id = obj.items[key].id;
			gr.createdon = obj.items[key].createdOn;
			gr.build=obj.items[key].build;
			gr.hostname=obj.items[key].hostname;
			gr.description=obj.items[key].description;
			gr.collectorsize=obj.items[key].collectorSize;
			gr.collectordeviceid=obj.items[key].collectorDeviceId;
			gr.lm_collector_group_id = obj.items[key].collectorGroupId;
			gr.insert();
		}
	}
	else{
		gs.error("LM-CMDB REST ERROR. Response Status " + httpStatus + " -- " + response.getErrorMessage());
		break;
	}
	offset += batchSize;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-08 20:34:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>1b348053db833300ed7e9b81ca961938</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LM - Collector Import (with Group Id)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB" source="x_lomo_lmcmdbint">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LogicMonitor CMDB">90ba7ce0dbd1e700727673278c96192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_1b348053db833300ed7e9b81ca961938</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-08 20:34:26</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>cmdb_ci</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="cmdb_ci">x_lomo_lmcmdbint_logicmonitor_enableCHANGESTOfalse^EQ<item endquery="false" field="x_lomo_lmcmdbint_logicmonitor_enable" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="false"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>LMb - Clear ABCG Value</name><order>200</order><priority>200</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	try{
			current.x_lomo_lmcmdbint_lm_abcg_id = '';
			current.setWorkflow(false);
			current.update();
	} catch (err) {
		gs.error("LM-CMDB Error Clearing ABCG ID");
	}
